verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, thou shalt \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony,

\w And|strong="H8033"\w* shalt \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* shalt \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w down|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w set|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* things \w that|strong="H5927"\w* \w are|strong="H5927"\w* commanded according \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rite. \w The|strong="H0853"\w* candlestick shall \w stand|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* \w lamps|strong="H5216"\w*,

\w And|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H0727"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* whereon \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* burnt, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w of|strong="H0727"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w*. Thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hanging|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w entry|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H0727"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*,
\w And|strong="H4196"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* holocaust:

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* thou shalt fill \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H8033"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.
\w And|strong="H0853"\w* thou shalt encompass \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w with|strong="H5414"\w* hangings, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* entry thereof.

\w And|strong="H8081"\w* thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* unction \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w*:
\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* holocaust \w and|strong="H4196"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*:

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* \w with|strong="H4886"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* foot: thou shalt \w consecrate|strong="H6942"\w* all \w with|strong="H4886"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w oil|strong="H4886"\w* \w of|strong="H3595"\w* unction, that \w they|strong="H6942"\w* may be most \w holy|strong="H6942"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7126"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* having \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*,

Thou shalt \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* vestments, \w that|strong="H6944"\w* \w they|strong="H6942"\w* \w may|strong="H0175"\w* \w minister|strong="H3547"\w* \w to|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H4886"\w*, \w and|strong="H0175"\w* \w that|strong="H6944"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* unction \w of|strong="H6944"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w may|strong="H0175"\w* prosper \w to|strong="H0854"\w* an everlasting \w priesthood|strong="H3547"\w*.
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H7126"\w* did all \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w had|strong="H0853"\w* commanded.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* first month \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* second year, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* first day \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* month, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tabernacle \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w set|strong="H0834"\w* \w up|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* reared \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w up|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* placed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* boards \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sockets \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bars, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H6680"\w* \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pillars,

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* spread \w the|strong="H1961"\w* roof \w over|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, putting \w over|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* cover, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Lord \w had|strong="H1961"\w* commanded.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ark, thrusting \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* underneath, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* oracle above.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ark \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* drew \w the|strong="H0853"\w* veil \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* fulfill \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w commandment|strong="H6680"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* table \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tabernacle \w of|strong="H0727"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w testimony|strong="H5715"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* north side without \w the|strong="H0853"\w* veil,

\w Setting|strong="H6680"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w order|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* loaves \w of|strong="H3068"\w* proposition, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* candlestick \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* south \w side|strong="H3409"\w*,

Placing \w the|strong="H0853"\w* lamps \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w order|strong="H6680"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* precept \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0853"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar \w of|strong="H0168"\w* gold \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* roof \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* veil,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5927"\w* upon \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* incense \w of|strong="H3068"\w* spices, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2091"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hanging \w in|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* entry \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar \w of|strong="H3068"\w* holocaust \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* entry \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony, \w offering|strong="H6999"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* holocaust, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H6999"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* laver between \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H4908"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar, filling \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w with|strong="H4908"\w* water.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* sons washed \w their|strong="H3068"\w* hands \w and|strong="H3068"\w* feet,

When \w they|strong="H8033"\w* went \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* covenant, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* went \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w as|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w had|strong="H5414"\w* commanded \w Moses|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* set \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w also|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* court round \w about|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tabernacle \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar, drawing \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hanging \w in|strong="H7364"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* entry thereof. \w After|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* things \w were|strong="H1121"\w* perfected,

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* cloud covered \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* testimony, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* glory \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* filled \w it|strong="H7126"\w*.

Neither \w could|strong="H6965"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w go|strong="H6965"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* covenant, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* cloud \w covering|strong="H4539"\w* \w all|strong="H5439"\w* things \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* majesty \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord shining, \w for|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* cloud \w had|strong="H4872"\w* covered \w all|strong="H5439"\w*.

If \w at|strong="H3068"\w* any \w time|strong="H4150"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* removed \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel went forward \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* troops:

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* hung \w over|strong="H5921"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w remained|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* \w place|strong="H4908"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord hung \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* day, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* fire \w by|strong="H5921"\w* night, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sight \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* mansions.
